entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 18. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h early this evening. Temperature steady near minus 18. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. High minus 16. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 16. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 22. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 24 in the evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023
